issue.title: [CF 917] Allow Global Cooldown doesn't work
issue.body:
Allow Global Cooldown doesn't work  on my DK and other classes (ru wow) . Tested without other addons too


> Posted by CurseForge user dps300 | Imported from CurseForge issue #917 | Raw

comments.body:
Please do not ignore the default ticket template.

You need to describe the issue that you are having in much greater detail if you want me to do anything. Just saying that it doesn't work isn't going to get the issue resolved. Also, please post the export string of the icon(s) that you are having trouble with. To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Restore". Select the "To string" ... "Icon: #" option, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

Edited Jan 17, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
